Alice.note_to_self: Claimed Node 20 (6-8-11). Target for second settlement should be a high-yield Wheat/Ore spot (like Node 42 or 43) to balance the starting economy. Road pointed toward Node 19 to maintain flexibility for expansion toward the center or the western coast.

Bob.note_to_self: Settled Node 42 (Wh9, O5, Wh9). Road placed toward Node 41 to secure Brick 10 and the Wood port at Node 40. Second settlement priority: Wood and Sheep. Target Node 11 (B6, S5, W12) or Node 31 (Wh9, B10, W11) if available on the return pick.

Charlie.note_to_self: Focus on reaching Node 5 as quickly as possible to dominate Wood/Brick production. My second settlement should target Wheat and Ore (aiming for Node 25) to ensure a balanced economy for the mid-game.
